Handmade by Experts: Ergonomically designed by experts with more than 50 years of experience in the industry, our scissors retain their sharpness and allow for easy handling that may help with hand fatigue.

Cleaning and Care: Clean the stainless steel after each use. We recommend using the protective case when not in use; should the scissors be dropped, they may become damaged and affect their functionality.

short_description: SAFE ROUND-TIP DESIGN FOR BABIES: These baby nail scissors are designed with a rounded tip that helps prevent accidental cuts, making nail care worry-free for newborns, infants, and toddlers. Perfect as baby nail clippers or baby nail cutters, they ensure your little one’s safety during grooming.

PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL BLADES: Crafted with rust-resistant stainless steel, the infant nail clippers feature thin, sharp edges for smooth trimming without pulling. The strong blade design ensures precise cutting, giving parents reliable baby safety nail clippers for everyday use.

ERGONOMIC LARGE-HOLE HANDLE: Designed with a wide, round-hole handle made of ABS resin, these baby nail scissors provide a secure grip and stable control. Parents can trim baby fingernail clippers with confidence, enjoying an easy and comfortable grooming experience.

PROTECTIVE CAP FOR CLEAN STORAGE: Each toddler nail clipper comes with a fitted cap to cover the blades when not in use. This prevents dust build-up, keeps the baby nail clippers hygienic, and makes them safe to carry in a diaper bag or travel kit.

SUITABLE FROM NEWBORN AND UP: These baby scissors nail tools are recommended for ages 0 months and above, growing with your baby’s needs. Whether used as newborn nail clippers or toddler nail scissors, they provide gentle and safe nail care throughout childhood.
product_description: Welcome to TYTDOUTER, where we provide safe, practical, and thoughtfully designed grooming tools for babies and toddlers. Our Baby Nail Scissors are made to simplify nail care while keeping your little one safe and comfortable. ✔ Safe Round Tip: Specially rounded scissor tips help protect delicate baby skin from accidental nicks. ✔ Sharp Thin Blades: Stainless steel blades cut smoothly and precisely, ideal for tiny, soft baby nails. ✔ Premium Material: Blades are stainless steel, while the handle and protective cap are made from hygienic ABS resin. ✔ Protective Cover: Comes with a secure cap for safe, dust-free storage when not in use. ✔ Ergonomic Grip: Large round-hole handle design makes the toddler nail clipper comfortable and stable to hold. ✔ Baby Safety Design: Created for use as infant nail clippers, baby scissors nail, or baby fingernail clippers with safety in mind. ✔ Portable Size: Compact and lightweight, perfect for at-home use or as a travel-friendly nail cutter for baby. ✔ All Ages: Recommended for newborns, infants, and toddlers—one tool that supports baby nail care through multiple growth stages. ✔ Essential for Parents: A must-have addition to your baby care essentials, providing peace of mind and safe grooming at home. PARAMETER/SPECIFICATION: Color: Mint Green Material: Stainless Steel Blade + ABS Resin Handle & Cap Dimensions: Approx. 6"L x 3.1"W Recommended Age: 0 months and up USAGE & SAFETY TIPS: ➤ Always trim nails in a well-lit area. ➤ Hold your baby’s hand firmly but gently while trimming. ➤ Use the protective cap when scissors are not in use. ➤ Keep out of reach of children when stored.
